about_the_game:
What is Winfray?
Winfray is an online multiplayer winter-themed snowball fighting game that I developed all by myself. Choose between a few game modes, them being Snowball Fight, Minigames, and Hordes!

Snowball Fight
Fight against other players in this multi-player FFA arena shooter. Pressing E in a snowball pile to pick up a snowball, or use the other weapons available to you. Ammo for different weapons can be purchased in the buy menu by pressing Q. The game mode is recommended to be played with at least 3-4 people, but 2 players can still work! Other features include:
  1. Cosmetics
  2. Double Jumping
  3. Crouching
  4. Sprinting
  5. Fast falling

Minigames
Choose from a list of minigames where you can earn coal.

Hordes
Prevent hordes of enemies from reaching the giant chicken! In this single-player game mode, earn tokens and XP by killing enemies while they try to destroy tour chicken! Your goal is to survive for 2 minutes and you'll receive an additional 200 XP and 100 tokens. These tokens can be used for upgrades that increase the health of your chicken, your snowball's damage, and your movement speed. Choose a difficulty before starting, and stop the horde!

Reviews

"I look nothing like the in-game character model"

"very fun to play with friends 10/10" - VeganDoritos
"I love the sexy running animation" - some random polish dude
"Game of the decade" - me
